snippet: The new Mexican-American Student Services program also aims to mend fences broken in the acrimony over the dismantling of the Mexican-American studies department last school year.
abstract: Tucson's new Mexican-American Student Services program is intended to cut the dropout rates and improve the performance of Hispanic students, by far the majority of the enrollment; program also aims to mend fences broken in the acrimony over the dismantling of the Mexican-American studies department in the previous school year.
lead_paragraph: The new Mexican-American Student Services program also aims to mend fences broken in the acrimony over the dismantling of the Mexican-American studies department last school year.

headline.seo: Tucson School District Tailors Program to Struggling Hispanic Students
headline.main: Tucson Schools Overhaul a Program to Help Struggling Hispanic Students
headline.print_headline: Tucson Schools Overhaul a Program to Help Struggling Hispanic Students
